title: Your coronavirus questions, answered
description:
On today's show, we answer listener questions: Why is there no TP? Will we run out of food? Can I get the virus from sex? How can I help? (Transcript here.)
An earlier version of this episode featured a section that could have been misconstrued as legal advice. It has been removed.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Your coronavirus questions, answered
itunes:author: Vox
itunes:subtitle: A team of experts answer listener questions: Why is there no TP? Will we run out of food? Can I get the virus from sex? Should I finally write my will? How can I help?

content:encoded:
On today's show, we answer listener questions: Why is there no TP? Will we run out of food? Can I get the virus from sex? How can I help? (Transcript here.)

An earlier version of this episode featured a section that could have been misconstrued as legal advice. It has been removed.
